name: Like Butter Mask for Dry, Sensitive & Eczema-Prone Skin
about: What it is:A lightweight, fast-absorbing, hydrating mask packed with soothing, calming, and replenishing ingredients for buttery-smooth skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture.Formulation:Mask.Highlighted Ingredients:- Colloidal Oatmeal: Visibly reduces redness and soothes irritation..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This dermatologist-tested mask visibly diminishes redness, addresses discomfort, and soothes visible signs of irritation while nourishing and supporting damaged, sensitive skin. Ideal for skin conditions causing extreme dryness, patches, flakes, and irritation, it rapidly infuses skin with moisture to relieve parched areas.
ingredients: -Colloidal Oatmeal: Helps to reduce the appearance of redness and soothe irritation..-Madecassoside (Centella asiatica): Supports and nourishes damaged skin resulting from external stressors..-Ceramides: Act as replenishing ingredients to help support skin's natural moisture barrier and maintain the acid mantle...Water/Aqua/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Niacinamide, Squalane, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Diheptyl Succinate, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Madecassoside, Angelica Polymorpha Sinensis Root Extract, Rheum Palmatum Root Extract, Astragalus Membranaceus Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Licorice Root (Glycyrrhiza Uralensis) Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phytosphingosine, Sodium PCA, Ceramide EOP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide NP, Alanine, Serine, Aspartic Acid, Valine, Threonine, Proline, Arginine, Phenylalanine, Histidine, Palmitic Acid, Isoleucine, PCA, Lauroyl Lysine, Tocopherol, Cholesterol, Stearic Acid, Sodium Lactate, Propylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Cetearyl Glucoside, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol...Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply as needed or as a daily moisture injection...Use as a 20-minute mask: .-Apply a thin, even layer to cleansed, damp skin..-Leave on for a minimum of 20 minutes..-Wipe off excess with a damp cloth...-Use overnight for intensive moisture: .-Apply a thin, even layer to cleansed, damp skin..-Leave on overnight..-In the morning, wipe off any excess with a damp cloth.

After some time I wondered how his skin was looking so moisturized, as he rarely uses skincare during the spring/summer time because he hates to look 'oily'. reviews.review_title: Review from topicals insider and beauty lover
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love! As someone with dry, sensitive skin, finding a moisturizer that truly nourishes and hydrates without irritating my skin can be a challenge, but this product has exceeded my expectations. From the moment I applied the moisturizer, I could feel its creamy, rich texture sinking deeply into my skin, providing long-lasting hydration that lasted throughout the day. Despite its thick consistency, it absorbed quickly and did not leave any greasy residue behind, which is a huge plus. The natural ingredients in this moisturizer are impressive - shea butter, mango butter, jojoba oil, and colloidal oatmeal are just a few of the nourishing ingredients that make up this formula. I appreciate that it is specifically formulated to soothe and heal irritated skin, making it a great choice for those with eczema or other skin concerns. What I love most about this moisturizer is how it has improved the overall texture and appearance of my skin. My complexion is more even, and my skin looks brighter and more hydrated than ever before. The packaging is also convenient and easy to use, with a pump dispenser that makes it simple to control the amount of product you use. Overall, I would highly recommend the Topicals Like Butter Moisturizer to anyone looking for a deeply nourishing and hydrating moisturizer that is specifically formulated for dry, sensitive, or eczema-prone skin. It has truly transformed my skin, and I can't imagine going back to any other moisturizer!

I started using Like Butter as a nighttime moisturizer and though it wasn‚Äôt an overnight miracle, I could feel a difference after one use. My skin drinks this stuff up despite being combination! Within a week my dry patches were gone as well as they breakouts I‚Äôd caused and my skin was feeling normal again! I use this every night and it has taken away the irritation sometimes involved with using retinol and ahas. I‚Äôm sold!
